detail_desc: Padded, fitted jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable faux fur collar and a ribbed section with an inner collar and zip at the front. Wind flap with press-studs down the front, welt side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Jeans in soft, patterned stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets, and slim legs with narrow hems.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, a concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband and reflective details.

Short-sleeved shirt in stretch cotton piqué with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long puff sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif.
Coiled plastic hair elastics.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a print motif. Ribbed collar, button placket, short slits in the sides and short sleeves with ribbed trims.
Wide blouse in soft leather with a grandad collar, V-shaped opening at the front and a covered button at the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow cuffs and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cotton with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in soft, double-weave organic cotton with buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Lined bandeau bikini top with lace on the front and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Ties at the back and a detachable strap that ties at the back of the neck. Side support and a concealed silicone trim at the top.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband and mesh sections on the legs.
Dungaree dress in stretch cotton denim with visible zips at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Patch front pockets, back pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Shorts in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly with buttons, patch front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Sports jacket in nylon with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and reflective details. Side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Mesh lining.
Short shorts in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high waist with elastication at the back, a detachable tie belt and side pockets.
Jumper knitted in a mohair blend with wide, half-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Loose-fitting, V-neck T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Top in soft velour with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut blouse in softly draping silk with a narrow collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
V-neck, long-sleeved jumper in boiled wool in a straight-cut relaxed fit with ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem.
Sandals in imitation patent leather decorated with tulle and chiffon flowers. Hook and loop tab at one side, imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Cropped top in a crinkled cotton weave. Square neckline with covered elastication, short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, and smocking and a small frill trim at the hem. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a round, gathered neckline and buttons down the front. Long balloon sleeves with hole embroidery and elastication at the cuffs.
Straight-cut T-shirt in a relaxed fit made from airy linen jersey.
Fitted, knee-length jersey dress with a stand-up collar and gathered neckline with an opening and covered buttons at the back. Small cap sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Calf-length coat in Italian wool with notch lapels and a one-button fastening at the front. Concealed front pockets and a high-cut single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a rounded, woven collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trim at the hem in a cotton weave.

Twill suit trousers in a wool blend with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, welt back pockets and flap leg pockets. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Metal snake chain necklace with large plastic beads in various designs. Adjustable length approx. 49-57 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuit, a pair of trousers and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Hat in braided straw with a band. Width of brim 4 cm.
Soft, cable-knit slippers with a decorative bow and pompoms at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Fully lined bikini in a textured-knit finish. Top with narrow, double, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the bikini is partly recycled.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Striped jumper in a textured-knit nylon and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Diagonal, welt front pockets and an elasticated, contrasting colour drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Jacket and trousers in soft fabric. Jacket with a zip down the front, chin guard and lined hood with ears on the top. Trousers in fleece with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.
Calf-length skirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a high waist, buttons down the front and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a wide, detachable tie belt, pleats at the front, a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners and side pockets.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with visible seams at the front, a decorative knot detail at the hem and wide ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Fully lined swimsuit with decorative bows on the shoulders and a print motif and appliqués on the front.
Double-layered tube scarf in jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a fluffy finish. Motif on the front, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy with adjustable straps that cross at the back and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back.

Outdoor jacket with a lightly padded front and back section in windproof and water-resistant functional fabric and a hood with an elasticated drawstring. High collar, a zip down the front, zipped side pockets, zipped inner pocket and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Hood, sleeves, side sections and hem with a lightly brushed thermal inside. Partly lined.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with long sleeves, a seam at the top and gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length skirt in soft jersey made from a modal blend. The skirt fits over the tummy and has concealed elastication at the waistband. Decorative seams down the front and back. Unlined.
Body in ribbed jersey with a low-cut back, long sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Long, thick socks in a jacquard knit with a pile lining.
5-pocket joggers in stretch, supersoft denim. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, a fake fly, low crotch and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Short jersey top with a gathered front, long sleeves and metallic-coloured plastic ring at the hem.
Cardigan in soft, moss-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in jersey.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Flared skirt in cotton chambray with adjustable elastication at the back of the waist, buttons down the front and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.

Jumper in a soft wool knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cashmere content of the jumper is recycled. The wool content is partly recycled.
Blouse in woven fabric with a flounce at the top, long, cuffed sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Round, gold-coloured button at the top and cuffs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton slub jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
